title: Last Judge
description: My master made a deal with the devil, but I'm the one who has to pay.Two items I've stolen for the Rebels, and I only need to steal one more thing for them.Trouble is, it's in Last Judge Mountain, a secret military base left over from before the High Queen of the Elves conquered Earth.There are things in Last Judge Mountain that should never again see the light of day.And if I go into the mountain, I might never come out again...
author: Jonathan Moeller
